resources.string:
Virtually True



Backtrack

We give the students a knight on the chessboard and spread some coins across the board ....
They have to move their peice in L shape and get as many coins as tgey can in given time provided they reach their initial position in tym

Agility Check

Team of two members
One person throws a ping pong ball and at tge other end a guy with flap dustbin opens tge flap using leg at right tym to take ball into the bin.

Recurr The Relation

The idea of game is...
Having four or five functions on different part of table( written as code )..
Some having function.. some random value( stack of paper having different value) ...
It is like playing with many recursion in a cup.

Believe Your Senses

This game is based on sound....
Different sound means different things...
Like turn left..turn right... Colors.. red.. Blue... Like that...
We make a string of sounds.. (having previous meaning)....
They have to tell from previous location where they are and what color is there shirt and what direction is their previous location
.It basically depend on audio.

How it Resembles

We will provide many objects in a loot which would relate to specific entities in CSE world and participants need to pick objects under the topic alloted...
Ex: A pack of shuttle cork represents a Stack as it can be taken out and entered from top
